definition: (literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman

sentences.english: A lady wears white yarn tippet, svelte coming from a distance.
sentences.chinese: 遠處還有一位身披白紗的貴婦，娉婷而來。

sentences.english: Memory of the terrier, who don't have two or three roses have a graceful demeanour, covered with flowers.
sentences.chinese: 記憶的梗上，誰不有兩三朵娉婷，披着情緒的花。

definition: to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
spry and lively (of dancing and movements)
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
autumn ripples/(fig.) luminous eyes of a woman/amorous glance
